ingredients.@value: ¾ c. sweet red wine (I used Gallo Family Vineyards Sweet Red)

recipeInstructions.@value: Add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients and mix well.
In a large bowl combine the butter, brown sugar, and sugar.  Mix until smooth.  Add the eggs one at a time, mixing until combined.
Remove from the oven and cool on a wire rack.

Fold in the chocolate chips.   Fill the small loaf pans ½-3/4 of the way full.  Place the paper loaf pans on a baking sheet and bake for 40 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.  (If you are making the bread in a regular sized loaf pan bake for 1 hour).
In a medium bowl combine the flour, cocoa powder, baking powder, and salt.
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees.  Spray 3 small loaf pans with cooking spray.
Add in the red wine and vanilla and mix until combined.
